pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fragility Index // Implements and extends the fragility index calculation for dichotomous results as described in Walsh, Srinathan, McAuley, Mrkobrada, Levine, Ribic, Molnar, Dattani, Burke, Guyatt, Thabane, Walter, Pogue, and Devereaux (2014) DOI:10.1016/j.jclinepi.2013.10.019.
